OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD CHAMBER OF COMMERCE - YOUNG CHAMBER SCHEME

Desc.entry: The Young Chamber is a vehicle for communication that allows young people to work with local businesses in a real and direct way. The Chamber of Commerce works with local school children and teachers, fostering links with local businesses to encourage enterprise activities and help students gain a real understanding of the business environment. Activities include employers setting problem-solving challenges, mentoring and interview tips and advice, allowing the workforce of the future to experience the world of business and enterprise.

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - LEISURE ACTIVITIES
